title: ANGELIA
content:
ANGELIA was the personified spirit (daimona) of messages, tidings and proclamations. The English word
        "angel" derives the same ancient Greek word.

Pindar, Olympian Ode 8. 81 ff (trans. Conway) (Greek lyric C5th B.C.) :
        "From Hermesâ€™ daughter, the maid Angelia (Message), Iphion shall hear and to Kallimakhos
        (Callimachus) tell the rich lustre of Olympia's glory, that Zeus has now bestowed unto their race."
